SCTX:
Begin MuseumHelmBloodworm

if ("Torasa Aram".helmbloodworm < 2)
	Disable
endif

if ("Torasa Aram".helmbloodworm == 2)
	Enable
endif

if (OnActivate == 1)
	set "Torasa Aram".helmbloodworm to 3
	Activate
	player->removeitem "bloodworm_helm_unique_x" 1
	player->additem "bloodworm_helm_unique" 1
endif


End MuseumHelmBearclaw
